Who am I?

Simon

I am a curious man, fascinated by Mystery. This quest led me to travel and explore human nature even further. As sensitive as I am sensible, I dedicate my time to the service of others.

About Me

Photography

Immortalize the beauty of the ephemeral

Time passes, nothing is eternal, so I invite you to prolong these sublime moments in memory, through photography.

Holistic Therapy

Blooming in depth

I respond to the call of a quest for meaning through the proposal of holistic therapy sessions. By working with breathing or through personalized support, we explore your path to fulfillment.
